- 操作系统:
    - 狭义: 内核
    - 广义: 发行版

- 快捷参考表:

    | Unit | \# Bytes | Hex |
    |------|-----------------|-----|
    | 1 KB | $2^{10}$ B | 0x00000400 |
    | 4 KB | $2^{12}$ B | 0x00001000 |
    | 1 MB | $2^{20}$ B | 0x00100000 |
    | 128 MB | $2^{27}$ B | 0x08000000 |
    | 1 GB | $2^{30}$ B | 0x40000000 |



> A **process** is an abstract data structure that represents all of the necessary information to run a program.
